mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE (ID, EMAIL, NAME, BUSINESS_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (CAFE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{businessNumber}, MEMBER_ID_SEQ.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID "id", EMAIL "email", c.NAME "name", c.MEMBER_ID "memberID", PHONE_NUMBER "phoneNumber", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", DESCRIPTION "description", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", "cafeRating", "reviewCount" FROM CAFE c LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, AVG(rev.RATING) "cafeRating" FROM REVIEW rev JOIN RESERVATION res ON rev.RESERVATION_ID = res.ID JOIN MEMBER mem ON rev.MEMBER_ID = mem.ID WHERE TYPE = 'guest' GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) a ON a.CAFE_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = c.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.ID) "reviewCount" FROM RESERVATION res JOIN REVIEW rv ON res.ID = rv.RESERVATION_ID JOIN MEMBER mem ON rv.MEMBER_ID = mem.ID WHERE TYPE = 'guest' GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) c ON c.CAFE_ID = c.ID Where c.ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 'enabled'

SELECT c.ID "id", EMAIL "email", c.NAME "name", PHONE_NUMBER "phoneNumber", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", DESCRIPTION "description", BUSINESS_NUMBER "businessNumber", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", MEMBER_ID "memberId" FROM CAFE c LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = c.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID Where MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 'enabled'

SELECT COUNT(c.ID) "id" FROM CAFE c LEFT JOIN (SELECT CAFE_ID, MAX(HEAD_COUNT) "maxPerson" FROM ROOM roo JOIN CAFE ON CAFE_ID = CAFE.ID GROUP BY CAFE_ID) b ON b.CAFE_ID = c.ID
STATUS = 'enabled' AND c.NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.ID IN (SELECT ca.ID FROM CAFE ca JOIN CAFE_OPTION_LIST col ON col.CAFE_ID = ca.ID WHERE col.OPTION_ID = #{option})
AND "maxPerson" >= #{countPerson}
ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
, DISTNACE_WGS84(LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, #{currentY}, #{currentX}) ASC

SELECT "id", "cafeName", "siDoName", "siGunGuName", "roadAddress", "detailAddress", "latitude", "longitude", "startTime", "endTime", "imagePath", "cafeRating", "minPrice", "reviewCount", "resCount" FROM (SELECT c.ID "id", c.NAME "cafeName", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", "cafeRating", "minPrice", "reviewCount", "resCount" FROM CAFE c LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, AVG(rev.RATING) "cafeRating" FROM REVIEW rev JOIN RESERVATION res ON rev.RESERVATION_ID = res.ID JOIN member mem ON rev.MEMBER_ID = mem.ID WHERE TYPE = 'guest' GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) a ON a.CAFE_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT CAFE_ID, MIN(PRICE) "minPrice" FROM ROOM roo JOIN CAFE ON CAFE_ID = CAFE.ID GROUP BY CAFE_ID) b ON b.CAFE_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = c.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.ID) "reviewCount" FROM RESERVATION res JOIN review rv ON res.ID = rv.RESERVATION_ID JOIN MEMBER mem ON rv.MEMBER_ID = mem.ID WHERE TYPE = 'guest' GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) c ON c.CAFE_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.ID) "resCount" FROM RESERVATION res WHERE res.STATUS = 'use' OR res.STATUS = 'complete' GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) d ON d.CAFE_ID = c.ID WHERE STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY "resCount" ASC, "cafeRating" ASC, REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
SELECT COUNT(ID) "count" FROM CAFE WHERE STATUS = 'enabled'

SELECT "id", "email", "cafeName", "phoneNumber", "siDoName", "siGunGuName", "roadAddress", "detailAddress", "description", "imagePath", "regdate", "businessNumber", "memberName" FROM (SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM / #{elementSize}) "request_page", "id", "email", "cafeName", "phoneNumber", "siDoName", "siGunGuName", "roadAddress", "detailAddress", "description", "imagePath", "regdate", "businessNumber", "memberName" FROM (SELECT c.ID "id", c.EMAIL "email", c.NAME "cafeName", c.PHONE_NUMBER "phoneNumber", sd.NAME "siDoName", sgg.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", DESCRIPTION "description", c.IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", TO_CHAR(c.REGDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') "regdate", BUSINESS_NUMBER "businessNumber", m.NAME "memberName" FROM CAFE c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.MEMBER_ID = m.ID JOIN SI_GUN_GU sgg ON c.SI_GUN_GU_ID = sgg.ID JOIN SI_DO sd ON sgg.SI_DO_ID = sd.ID WHERE c.STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY c.regdate DESC ORDER BY c.regdate ASC)) WHERE "request_page" = #{requestPage}

SELECT "month", COUNT(regdate) "cafeCount" FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -ROWNUM + 1), 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM') "month" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) LEFT JOIN CAFE ON TO_CHAR(TRUNC(regdate, 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM') = "month" AND CAFE.STATUS = 'enabled' GROUP BY "month" ORDER BY "month"
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM CAFE WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)) AND SYSDATE
